## rds-button-group Readme

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


### Properties

| Property          | Attribute           | Description                                                           | Type      | Default |
| ----------------- | ------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `mobileFullWidth` | `mobile-full-width` | If true, buttons are full-width and equally spaced on mobile screens. | `boolean` | `false` |


### Slots

| Slot | Description                                                                                                                        |
| ---- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|      | You can place one or more RdsButtons to form a group. *The button group is only designed to work with Tertiary button appearance*. |
